Susanna Reid made a rather obvious dig at weather presenter Laura Tobin on Monday's Good Morning Britain as they discussed climate change.
Susanna and her co-host Richard Madeley spoke to Laura live… [+2117 chars]

articles.title: Russian Election: 'Magic hand' puts paper in Russian ballot box as claims of fraud raised - Sky News
articles.description: There have been claims of fraud in the latest Russian election, and CCTV footage shared by the opposition Yabloko Party shows a hand appearing to put numerous piece of paper inside a ballot box in Belovo, Kemerovo Oblast, near the border with China, Mongolia …

articles.author: James Robinson
articles.title: Prince Charles 'met fixer William Bortrick at centre of cash for honours storm NINE times' - Daily Mail
articles.description: William Bortrick, a paid advisor to tycoon Mahfouz Marei Mubarak bin Mahfouz - is said to have met the Prince in Britain and abroad on at least nine occasions, according to the Sunday Times.
articles.content:
The Prince of Wales met the 'fixer' at the heart the 'cash for honours' scandal at least nine times, it has today been reported.

articles.title: Emma Thompson reveals she has gifted husband Greg Wise with CONDOMS ahead of Strictly appearance - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Crown actor, 55, is part of this year's Strictly Come Dancing line-up and it was revealed during Saturday's launch show that he is partnered with professional Karen Hauer, 39.
